text: Arthur Guseni Oliver Mutambara (born 25 May 1966)All you need to know about Arthur Mutambara New Zimbabwe is a Zimbabwean politician. He became the President of a faction of the Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) in February 2006.Zimbabwe's 'outsider' faction leader BBC News He has worked as the Managing Director and CEO of Africa Technology and Business Institute since September 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean politicians
title: Arthur Mutambara
